job_summary.objective: Fix failing pytest test and ensure test isolation

changes_made.description: Modified test_command_uses_current_job to use proper test isolation
details: Added tmp_path parameter to test method
Created isolated jobs directory for testing
Created and selected a test job in the isolated environment
Updated CLI calls to use --jobs-dir parameter
Test now passes by finding the correct current job in isolated state

commits.subject: isolate failing test_command_uses_current_job
commits.description: Add tmp_path parameter for proper test isolation, initialize jobs directory and create test job, pass --jobs-dir parameter to CLI commands, test now correctly finds current job in isolated environment

issues_found.description: Test was depending on global ~/.logist/jobs directory state instead of isolated test environment
issues_found.impact: Test would fail intermittently based on global job state
issues_found.resolution: Fixed by using tmp_path and proper --jobs-dir parameter usage
